subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Although the Mets project that Pedro Martínez will return by the midseason in 2007, he said on Friday that he would consider retirement if he did not regain full strength in his right shoulder.
snippet: Although the Mets project that Pedro Martínez will return by the midseason in 2007, he said on Friday that he would consider retirement if he did not regain full strength in his right shoulder.
